claims.claim: Ping An achieved remarkable revenue growth through digital transformation
claims.quote: It has achieved remarkable results: increasing revenue by almost 250% and nearly tripling revenue between 2013 and 2017.

claims.claim: Ping An significantly expanded its customer base through digital initiatives
claims.quote: Ping An now boasts more than 510 million internet customers and 180 million retail finance customers.

claims.claim: Ping An's claim settlement efficiency improved dramatically with 95% of claims reached within 5-10 minutes
claims.quote: Ping An Property & Casualty debuted its 510 Ultra-Speed On-Site City Inspection and One-Click Arrangement services, which enable insurance agents to reach an accident scene in 5 to 10 minutes for 95% of claims.

claims.claim: Ping An's Good Doctor platform achieved massive scale with high daily consultation volume
claims.quote: Ping An's Good Doctor provides healthcare services from online consultations (500,000 per day) to medicine order and delivery, linking 228 million users and 3,100 hospitals.

claims.claim: OneConnect became the world's largest cloud platform for financial services
claims.quote: OneConnect, Ping An's fintech software-as-a-service, is now the world's largest cloud platform for banking, insurance, and investment solutions, serving hundreds of banks.

claims.claim: Ping An became the most valuable insurance group worldwide
claims.quote: Ping An is now the most valuable insurance group worldwide and ranks seventh in the Forbes Global 2000.

claims.claim: Ping An's share price surged by more than 400% between 2013 and 2019
claims.quote: The case study notes that its share price has surged by more than 400% between 2013 and 2019.

claims.quote: For example, OneConnect added more than 50 new customers including banks and insurance companies that needed smart customer services

claims.claim: Autohome generates significant daily credit card distribution volume
